sentences.sContent: The bell is massive, weighing over 40 tons.
sentences.sCn: 那口钟非常大，有40多吨重。

sentences.sContent: ...The massive decline in sleep happened so slowly and quietly that few seemed to notice the trend...
...we derive massive economic benefits when we buy the most affordable energy on the world market and when we engage in energy trade around the world...
...the boxes can withstand massive force and temperatures up to 2...

exam.question: Among all the changes resulting from the __________ entry of women into the work force, the transformation that has occurred in the women themselves is not the least important.

answer.explain: 句意： 在所有因大量妇女成为社会劳动力而带来的变化中， 妇女自身的转变颇为重要。quantitative： 数量的； 定量的； surplus： 剩余的； formidable： 强大的； 可怕的。

synos.tran: 大量的；巨大的，厚重的；魁伟的

words.tran: 群众的，民众的；大规模的，集中的
块，团；群众，民众；大量，众多
